title: Beam Me Up
lyrics:
We've seen the lightning
Far out at sea
Walk down the beach and teach me
Everything leaves me
Far out of reach

We couldn't see the reason



Nothing sees me

No one can hear me

Somebody beam me up



Return of the old gods

Nothing is new

We have commands that feed us



No way of knowing

What is in view

Nothing's a secret genius



Nothing sees me

No one can hear me

Somebody beam me up



Beam me up



Drown in the sand there

Down on one knee

Nothing should be this easy



You were like white noise

Pulling at me

If only we'd known we'd blown it



Stand on a knife's edge

Look at the view

Think of the scene or leave it



Show me a clear sky

Cut it in two

Swallow us up and dream it



Nothing sees me

No one can hear me

Somebody beam me up



Beam me up



Beam me up
